Technosis: Trinity, he's breathing, so I think he's going to be okay,
there's no sign of any injuries it seems.

Technosis breaths a sigh of relief.

Technosis: You and him are so brave, Trinity, I'm scared of Deemos, so
scared of him...

----- Original Message -----
From: <logomorph@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, November 25, 2000 9:22 AM
Subject: Re: MeowMix


> Trinity::
> "He looks like he needs to get to a CR chamber."  She meowed softly,
> worried for Zeni. She was also getting mad at the bot who hurt her
> friend. She was wishing she was bigger, so she could get back at that
> bot. "Zeni, you just hang on. You can't leave, ok? So you can die. If
> you died, we couldn't play together. And I'd be lonely. So you can't
> die OK? We'll get you fixed up. OK"
>
> Trinity didn't know how badly Zeni was hurt or what exactly was wrong
> with him. But she was scared to lose another bot whom she felt close
> to.  She had lost her entire family and now was worried she would
> lose a friend.
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> > Technosis: He's knocked out, this is bad. WHat kind of person would
> strike a
> > child like this. Zeni darling? Are you okay? Trinity, no matter what
> > happens, I'll protect you and Zeni, it gives me a purpose in life,
> so pleae,
> > for me, stay out of this battle, okay?...
> >
> > Technosis picks Zeni up in her arms, he was only as big as Trinity
> in robot
> > mode, so someone as small as Technosis could easily pick him up.
> (Technosis
> > was always ridiculed for being small)
>
>
>
>
>
>
